data.name: Chaos Crown
data.detailed_description:
Limited Offer!

20% discount on launch! Add Chaos Crown to your wishlist and get notified!


Join our Discord


About the Game

Chaos Crown is an RPG Styled Roguelite set in fantasy procedural paths. Craft artifacts, slay legendary monsters and abuse synergies to fulfill the secret goal of your champion. Which one will you choose? We need your feedback before the official launch!


CHOOSE YOUR CHAMPION
Each champion has its own unique set of spells and skills. Which one fits your playstyle? From the mighty Toad to the sneaky Assassin, you'll probably find your favorite.


CRUSH YOUR FOES
Clear rooms filled with monsters to progress further into the procedural path. By slaying monsters, you gain xp and sometimes basic items that you can later use to craft artifacts.


CRAFT ARTIFACTS
You can merge items together to create unique artifacts. Adapt to your loot and find creative ways to abuse synergies. This system will grow exponentially the more items are added to the game.


LEVEL UP
Once you gather enough xp, regain a portion of your health and some skill points. Spend them in a hand crafted skills tree!


BARGAIN WITH THE CHAOS LORDS
Demonic spirits will help you reach out to your goal, for a price. As you progress further, you'll have the opportunity to uncover many secrets by speaking to those agents of chaos.

Logos & Capsule's credits goes to @NelsieOo on Instagram!
Credits of the trailer's music (Netzach) goes to Arkana on Youtube!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690 CPU @ 3.5GHz 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690 CPU @ 3.5GHz 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
